title: Sri Lanka to roll out fourth COVID-19 jab from May 09
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will roll out a fourth COVID-19 vaccine dose, or second booster, starting next Monday (09), Health Minister Channa Jayasumana said.
The latest jab will be mandatory for people over 60 years of age and will be optional for people between 20 to 60 years, he said. (Colombo/May06/2022)
